name: AnimatedPositionedDirectional
desc: Animated version of [PositionedDirectional] which automatically transitions the child's position over a given duration whenever the given position changes.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: start
fields.desc: The offset of the child's start edge from the start of the stack.

fields.name: top
fields.desc: The offset of the child's top edge from the top of the stack.

fields.name: end
fields.desc: The offset of the child's end edge from the end of the stack.

fields.name: bottom
fields.desc: The offset of the child's bottom edge from the bottom of the stack.
